script.name: !plugin.autotrade.ware.bl.mgr
script.description: Autotrade - Open the MK3 Cargo Manager Menu

line.comment: * add old saved wares if not on board anymore
* If I save MAX amount of wares, expand saveable amount to next decade
* add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$ware, value array=$array.choose.ware.amount, default=$local.amount.saved, return id=$ware
* Add fight drone mkII info line to bottom
* Update local vars with chosen values
* user pressed enter after selecting a ware amount. reopen menu

sval.val: Autotrade - Open the MK3 Cargo Manager Menu
add old saved wares if not on board anymore
If I save MAX amount of wares, expand saveable amount to next decade
add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$ware, value array=$array.choose.ware.amount, default=$local.amount.saved, return id=$ware
Add fight drone mkII info line to bottom
Update local vars with chosen values
user pressed enter after selecting a ware amount. reopen menu
